text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse Step up Mike, before your fuhrer kills all of us. Surely your god tells you to do the right thing. Don't be a lemming. Allegiance to a delusional dictator is not admirable.  #GOP #COVID19 #coronavirus #REALITY #trump #Pence #DrFauci
